metadata.name: After Me, Neverending
metadata.description:
Asemic poetry draws attention to the ‘matter’ of inscription,  
showing the mark of the sign itself, freed from the need to mean:  
free enough to be nothing, but itself.  
 
The computer, when it writes, does not know what it means  
to write — and yet, nevertheless, it still goes on writing,  
and what it writes still makes things happen….  
 
Generative Art coded in JavaScript.
